origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'RealEstateAPI.get_loan_policy', 'description': 'This function retrieves the latest real estate loan policy for a specified city.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'city', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the city for which the loan policy is required.'}, {'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of policy to retrieve, e.g., latest, historical.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policyDetails', 'description': 'The details of the loan policy for the specified city.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 RealEstateAPI.get_loan_policy, 它的参数输入如下: 'city'是'Shanghai', 'policyType'是'latest'.
